title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-4.2 - Inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-4.2 - Inspection

State Regulations

The boiler shall be thoroughly inspected internally and
externally and a hydrostatic pressure test shall be applied if required by the
inspector. If the boiler is found to be safe, a certificate of inspection shall
be issued. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-4.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
